mapper.select: select ssa.id,ssa.spu_id,ssa.base_sale_attr_id,ssa.sale_attr_name, ssav.id sale_attr_value_id,ssav.spu_id,ssav.sale_attr_value_name from spu_sale_attr ssa inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id where ssa.spu_id=#{spu_id} and ssa.is_deleted = 0 and ssav.is_deleted = 0

select ssa.id,ssa.spu_id,ssa.base_sale_attr_id,ssa.sale_attr_name, ssav.id sale_attr_value_id,ssav.sale_attr_value_name, skav.sku_id, if(skav.sku_id is null,0,1) is_checked from spu_sale_attr ssa inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id left join sku_sale_attr_value skav on skav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id and sku_id = #{skuId} where ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} order by ssa.id,ssav.id
